abstract: Marceline Loridan-Ivens writes about her life during Nazi occupied France and her time as Auschwitz-Birkenau camp prisoner in soon-to-be released English-language translation of memoir But You Did Not Come Back; Left Bank resident and outspoken critic of France’s anti-Semitic culture says terrorist attacks in Paris stem from French society's apathy to bias against Jews.
snippet: Marceline Loridan-Ivens, whose memoir takes the form of a letter to her murdered father, says the France where her family sought protection is increasingly at risk....

abstract: National September 11 Memorial Museum has been unable to obtain photographs of 10 out of 2,983 people killed during terrorist attack, leaving handful of blank spaces in its portrait gallery; families of three victims have opted not to display their loved ones' portraits, while remaining seven have defied search.
snippet: A gallery at the National September 11 Memorial Museum has photos of all but 10 of the 2,983 people killed in either the 2001 terrorist attacks or the 1993 World Trade Center bombing....
lead_paragraph: A gallery at the National September 11 Memorial Museum has photos of all but 10 of the 2,983 people killed in either the 2001 terrorist attacks or the 1993 World Trade Center bombing.

abstract: United States revamps program designed to lure foreign fighters away from extremist groups like Islamic State after officials report that previous efforts failed to stop recruitment; new efforts include using Facebook videos, Instagram ads and other social media to imply joining militants will disappoint parents, tear apart families and leave loved ones with empty lives.
snippet: The Obama administration is changing its outreach program after critics said it was turning away the very people it tried to reach....
lead_paragraph: The Obama administration is changing its outreach program after critics said it was turning away the very people it tried to reach.

abstract: French government committee probing two terrorist attacks in 2015, including Paris attacks, recommends nation's intelligence agencies be streamlined and combined; finds extensive failures in collection and study of information could have helped stopped attacks.
snippet: Lawmakers who took part in the examination called on the authorities to merge overlapping and sometimes competing agencies....
lead_paragraph: Lawmakers who took part in the examination called on the authorities to merge overlapping and sometimes competing agencies.

abstract: Iraqi civilians fleeing fighting in Islamic State-held Falluja, Iraq, are finding more suffering in government-run aid camps, where supplies to care for them are scarce; Iraqi government's tight control of traffic between Baghdad and Anbar Province is making it difficult for aid agencies to deliver goods to camps and Falluja area.
snippet: Survivors reach aid camps hungry, thirsty and scared, and their ordeals are not over: They are in the arms of a government without the resources to care for them....
lead_paragraph: Survivors reach aid camps hungry, thirsty and scared, and their ordeals are not over: They are in the arms of a government without the resources to care for them.
